mapper.sql: rec_id, member_id, points, fund_fee_rate, company_name, company_logo, licence, platform_prot, sy_prot, status, failure_reason, area_id,company_abbreviation
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sy_syshop_account
order by ${orderByClause}
select member_id,fund_fee_rate from sy_syshop_account where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sy_syshop_account (member_id, points, fund_fee_rate, company_name, company_logo, licence, platform_prot, sy_prot, status, failure_reason, area_id) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{points,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundFeeRate,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{failureReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

rec_id = #{record.recId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
points = #{record.points,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
points = #{points,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_fee_rate = #{fundFeeRate,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_logo = #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform_prot = #{platformProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sy_prot = #{syProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
failure_reason = #{failureReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where rec_id = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sy_syshop_account set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, points = #{points,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_fee_rate = #{fundFeeRate,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_logo = #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_prot = #{platformProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sy_prot = #{syProt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, failure_reason = #{failureReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where rec_id = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.rec_id, a.member_id, a.points, a.fund_fee_rate, a.company_name, a.brand_name, a.company_introduction, a.company_logo,a.company_banner,a.licence, a.platform_prot, a.sy_prot,a.status,a.failure_reason,a.area_id FROM sy_syshop_account a,sy_store b WHERE a.member_id=b.member_id AND a.member_id=#{memberId}
